com.itko.lisa.remote.client

Class AgentClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.itko.lisa.remote.client.AgentClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAgentEventListener, com.itko.lisa.remote.plumbing.IBrokerEventListener, com.itko.lisa.remote.plumbing.IJMSInvocationListener, com.itko.lisa.remote.plumbing.INotificationListener, IStatsEventListener

    public class AgentClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAgentEventListener, com.itko.lisa.remote.plumbing.IBrokerEventListener, IStatsEventListener, com.itko.lisa.remote.plumbing.IJMSInvocationListener, com.itko.lisa.remote.plumbing.INotificationListener
    The main client class used to interact with the agent
